altTitles.vi: Vợ ơi, xin hãy ngoan nhé!

description.en:
This is brought to you by the same author of "My Wife Is From a Thousand Years Ago". 

"If you could go back in time, what would you do?"

"I would go to the school entrance and wait for you every day to pursue you shamelessly until you're my girlfriend. What about you?"

"Hmm... I will definitely carefully wait until I'm twenty-four to get to know you again, then gradually fall in love, then get married, and then ask you this question. I live cautiously because I'm afraid that the butterfly effect will make me lose you."

title.en: Naori wa Shinai ga, Mashi ni Naru

altTitles.ja: なおりはしないが、ましになる

altTitles.zh: 虽然无法治愈，但是可以改善

title.en: Kimi to Uchuu wo Aruku Tame ni

altTitles.ja: 君と宇宙を歩くために

altTitles.en: I Want To Walk In Space With You

description.en:
Kobayashi is a Yankee who can neither study nor hold down a part-time job. One day, the eccentric Uno is transferred into his class. Uno saves Kobayashi from a questionable part-time job offered to him by a senior student, and the two become good friends after this incident. The more he learns about Uno, the more he is attracted to his lifestyle, and Kobayashi tries to change himself...

This is a story of friendship between two people who are complete opposites in terms of their inability to live normally, and who struggle to live happily despite the obstacles they face.

A small island where the sky and sea shine. That is the hometown of Nichiko.
She returns to the island by herself after being away for many years and begins to live in her parents' house, which still has an empty dog kennel!

Haruka Sakura wants nothing to do with weaklings—he's only interested in the strongest of the strong. He's just started at Furin High School, a school of degenerates known only for their brawling strength—strength they use to protect their town from anyone who wishes it ill. But Haruka's not interested in being a hero or being part of any sort of team—he just wants to fight his way to the top!
description.pt-br: A Fûrin High School ganhou a pior reputação entre as escolas da região por ter a média mais baixa e os alunos mais rebeldes. E nela ingressa Haruka Sakura, um jovem que acaba de chegar na cidade, que busca ser o mais forte para poder proteger todos com quem se importa. Para atingir seu objetivo, porém, a primeira coisa que ele deve fazer é se juntar a uma gangue chamada Wind Breaker, que representa seu instituto e cujo objetivo é defender a cidade de outras gangues e bandidos. No entanto, para que eles o aceitem, ele terá que ganhar o respeito deles com os punhos!

description.en:
She was destroying people… in her mind.

Kiho Ishiguro is a high school girl who's an honor student at school, and devotes herself to her disabled mother at home. She is quiet and gentle, but deep down inside she has always had the urge to "hit someone." As her feelings gets stronger day by day, Kiho encounters a street criminal. She snaps and unleashes her rage on the bad guy without restraint…? Here comes the JK who will revolutionize the world of women's MMA!
description.es: Kuroishi Kiho, en la escuela es una estudiante ejemplar, en casa es una buena hija que ayuda a su madre con sus problemas en las piernas... pero en sus fantasías, es alguien que hace pedazos a la gente. Aunque parece tranquila y gentil, en lo más profundo de su corazón existe un impulso que la hace querer "golpear a otros". Desbordada por las fantasías que no la dejan en paz, decide confrontar a un violador, ¿Será capaz de liberar y apaciguar sus emociones reprimidas con este criminal? ¡Entra en escena la estudiante de preparatoria que podría revolucionar las artes marciales de mujeres!

description.en: A fighter, a wizard and a misguiding spirit are on Nameless Isle-what happens next is the stuff of heroes - or not! It's up to them.

title.en: FPS de Shoshinsha Bokotte Real Fight ni Hattenshita Kekka w

altTitles.ja: FPSで初心者ボコってリアルファイトに発展した結果w

altTitles.ja-ro: FPS de Shoshinsha Bokotte Real Fight ni Hattenshita Kekka w

altTitles.en: After Beating a Noob in an FPS, He Wanted to Fight Me in Real Life LOL

altTitles.vi: Sau Khi Bị Tôi Bón Hành Trong Game, Có Đứa Hẹn Kèo Đánh Tôi!

altTitles.id: Hasil dari Mengalahkan seorang Pemula di FPS yang Berkembang Menjadi Pertarungan di RL haha

altTitles.ro: Luptând Cu Un Începător La Jocurile FPS

altTitles.th: มือใหม่หัดรัก

description.en: One day, when I was making school supplies in the art room, a very scary-looking girl was staring at me...!? Crafts girl vs. art boy romantic comedy!!
description.ru: В один прекрасный день Ибуки Синтаро поручили сделать ящик для предложений только потому, что он состоит в художественном кружке. Пока он работал с непривычными для него инструментами, он заметил на себе сверлящий взгляд устрашающей девчонки. Неожиданно она забирает у него пилу и энергичными движениями начинает резать доску! Так начинаются отношения между мальчишкой-художником и девчонкой-мастерицей!
description.th: “ในวันหนึ่ง ขณะที่กำลังทำงานอุปกรณ์ในห้องศิลปะ มีเด็กสาวที่มีหน้าตาน่ากลัวกำลังเฝ้ามองมาที่ผม...!?” เรื่องราวความรักคอมเมดี้ระหว่างสาวช่างฝีมือกับหนุ่มสายศิลป์!?
description.pt-br:
Um dia, quando eu estava fazendo material escolar na sala de arte, uma garota muito assustadora estava olhando para mim...!? 

Menina do artesanato vs. garoto da arte comédia romântica!!

description.en: A parting with one mom and a meeting with another. Our close and distant parting story.
description.fr:
"Cœur de pierre."
C'était ce que Lee Eunyoung avait toujours l'habitude d'utiliser pour décrire sa mère. Mais après le décès de sa mère, Eunyoung découvre un journal qui montre des choses qu'elle ne savait même pas au sujet de la femme qui l'a élevée. La lecture de ces écrits permet à Eunyoung de continuer à sentir la présence de sa mère et résoudre leur relation compliquée, mais à mesure que les pages restantes diminuent et que les visions qui lui tenaient compagnie commencent à s'estomper, elle est forcée de faire face à sa nouvelle réalité et de faire ses derniers adieux.

altTitles.ja: すくすくもんすたーず

description.en:
On my 8th grade summer break,  I arrived at my grandma’s house to find it turned into a daycare? A tone-deaf mermaid, a timid zombie a hectic daily life as I take care of these monsters with unique traits. Although, I can’t seem to get used to this job, I’ll try my best!
A cute and heartwarming monster-daycare comedy!

altTitles.th: ดรูอิดแห่งสถานีโซล

description.de:
Was wie ein gewöhnlicher Tag begann, wird auf den Kopf gestellt, als eine mysteriöse Katastrophe die Erde heimsucht und Soo Ho Park auf einen anderen Planeten befördert. Mit der Zeit lernt er, sich anzupassen und um sein Überleben in dieser fremden Welt zu kämpfen. Doch eines Tages wird Soo Ho genauso plötzlich wieder auf die Erde zurückgeholt, wie er auf dem neuen Planeten gelandet ist. Schnell erfährt er, dass eine Rückkehr zu seinem vergangenen Leben nicht möglich ist, denn die Erde befindet sich in einem ständigen Kampf mit Monstern, denen es gelungen ist, den Planeten zu infiltrieren. Wie wird Soo Ho gegen die Monster ankämpfen und wird er dieses Mal mit seinen derzeitigen Fähigkeiten überleben können?

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/guilaideyishijiewangzhe/list?title_no=1771)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/fantasy/druid-seoul-station/list?title_no=3367)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001631)

- [Official German Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/de/action/the-druid-of-seoul-station/list?title_no=3642)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/fantasy/druid-seoul-station/list?title_no=3586)

- [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/fantasy/seoul-station-druid/list?title_no=3301)
description.en:
What started out as an ordinary day turned upside down when an unknown catastrophe struck Earth, transporting Suho Park to a different planet. He eventually learns how to adapt and fight for his survival in this foreign world, but one day, just as suddenly as he was sucked into this new planet, Suho is pulled back to Earth!

 He quickly learns that return to life as he remembers it is no longer possible, as Earth is in constant battle with monsters who’ve managed to infiltrate the planet.

How will Suho fight against the monsters attacking Earth, and will he be able to survive this time with his current skills?

---

- [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/fantasy/seoul-station-druid/list?title_no=3301)
description.fr:
Ce qui a commencé comme une journée ordinaire a basculé lorsqu'une catastrophe inconnue a frappé la Terre, transportant Suho Park sur une autre planète. Ce dernier apprend peu à peu à s'adapter et à se battre pour survivre dans ce monde étranger, mais un jour, tout aussi soudainement qu'il a été transporté sur cette nouvelle planète, Suho est miraculeusement ramené sur Terre. Il apprend rapidement que le retour à la vie normale telle qu'il se souvient n'est plus possible, car la Terre est en lutte constante avec des monstres qui ont réussi à s'infiltrer sur la planète. Suho trouvera-t-il un moyen de se battre contre les monstres qui attaquent la Terre, et pourra-t-il survivre avec ses compétences actuelles ?

Suho, kembali ke Bumi setelah seribu tahun menghilang di dunia lain. Namun, dunia yang dulu ditinggali sekarang telah berubah menjadi dunia kebiadaban dengan munculnya monster-monster!

description.ja:
「この世界の支配者は俺だ！」 異世界に迷い込んでから1000年ぶりに地球に帰還した緒形元汰。その間に、地球はモンスターの登場により、完璧な弱肉強食の世界に変わっていた。異世界にて1000もの間、激しい生存競争のすえに、動物の王として降臨した緒形元汰は、ドルイドとして地球征服に乗り出す！

description.ko:
이세계로 사라진 뒤 천 년 만에 지구로 귀환한, 박수호.
그 사이 세상은 몬스터의 등장으로 철저한 약육강식의 세상으로 변해 있었다.
천 년 동안 처절한 생존경쟁으로 살아남은 동물의 왕 드루이드, 세계 정복에 나서다.

이제부터 이 구역의 지배자는 나다.

description.pl:
Park Sooho powrócił na Ziemię po tym, jak przeniósł się do innego świata na tysiąc lat. W tym czasie Ziemia zmieniła się w świat przetrwania najsilniejszych dzięki pojawieniu się potworów. Druid, król zwierząt, któremu udało się przetrwać przez tysiąc lat, wyrusza teraz na podbój świata.

description.ru:
Пак Су Хо, провел тысячу лет с животными и стал друидом.
Тем временем мир превратился в мир жестокости и появились монстры. Друид и царь зверей,
выживший в ожесточенной битве за выживание в течение тысячи лет, отправляется покорять мир.
"Отныне я правитель!"

description.th:
"พัคซูโฮ" กลับมายังโลก หลังจากที่ตกไปอีกโลกนับพันปี ในขณะเดียวกัน โลกที่ซูโฮเคยอาศัยอยู่ได้กลายเป็นสนามรบตั้งแต่มีมอนสเตอร์ปรากฏตัวจากอีกโลกหนึ่ง จากนี้ไป พัคซูโฮ ดรูอิดผู้รอดชีวิตจากป่าอันโหดร้ายและกลายเป็นราชาแห่งสัตว์ ได้เริ่มต้นการต่อสู้เพื่อพิชิตโลก!

description.zh:
千年归来的万物之王！
从现在开始出击征服世界！
朴修浩意外来到异世界后，在千年的生存竞争中成功存活并成为了动物之王。时隔千年又意外重返地球。 在此期间，世界因为怪兽的出现，而彻底变成了弱肉强食的世界。为了继续生存朴修浩开始征服人类世界！

title.en: Life on a Deserted Island with an Enemy Female Soldier

altTitles.es-la: Soldados enemigos que se estrellaron juntos en una isla desierta.

altTitles.ja: 敵国の女兵士と無人島で共同生活する事になるやつ

altTitles.ja-ro: Tekikoku no Onna Heishi to Mujintou de Kyoudou Seikatsu suru Koto ni Naru Yatsu

altTitles.ja: 異国の女兵士と無人島生活

altTitles.ja-ro: Ikoku no Onna Heishi to Mujintou Seikatsu

description.en: Two soldiers speaking different languages land on a deserted island, they will have to live together to survive...
description.es-la: Dos soldados que hablan distintos idiomas caen en una isla desierta, tendrán que convivir juntos para sobrevir...

altTitles.fr: Cynthia ou le Rythme de la vie

description.en:
(from ebookjapan):

Joining the Rhythmic Gymnastics Club, a fateful encounter ensues! Hikaru Kamijo transfers to Aika Junior High School, where he fatefully meets the next Rhythmic Gymnastics Queen, Hazuki Shiina, and the Gymnastics Club's Hope, Takaaki Oishi!

In the midst of a crowd of top athletes, Hikaru faces an athlete selection test to compete in a national junior high school competition....　

This is the first volume of the rhythmic gymnastics manga that was a big hit in Weekly Margaret in the 80's, depicting the agony and love of an athlete with a flexible brush stroke!

"Let's go out with me." While Ki Young Hyun, a timid model student, was leaving school early, the person he bumped into in an alley was Daehan, who was famous for being a bully at school. He was scared and tried to sneak away from him, but he suddenly grabbed his wrist and dragged him into the cafe....

title.en: Yuusha-sama wa Houshuu ni Hitozuma wo go Kibou desu

altTitles.ja: 勇者さまは報酬に人妻をご希望です

altTitles.ja-ro: Yuusha-sama wa Houshuu ni Hitozuma o go Kiboudesu

altTitles.en: The Hero Wants a Married Woman as a Reward

description.en:
The hero, Chloe, is a strange hero who demands a bounty when saving people.  And what makes it different is the prize... He only likes married women, so he demands the prettiest Milf in town.

**"If you want me to save the city, give me the most beautiful milf"**

 A unique erotic Fantasy story created by a hero!
description.id:
Pahlawan ini keji...!!  Pahlawan, Chloe, adalah pahlawan aneh yang menuntut hadiah saat menyelamatkan orang. Dan yang membuatnya berbeda adalah hadiahnya...Dia hanya senang dengan wanita yang sudah menikah, jadi dia menuntut Milf yang paling cantik di kota. 

"Jika kau ingin aku menyelamatkan kota, berikan aku milf yang paling cantik" 

Sebuah cerita unik fantasi erotis yang dibuat oleh pahlawan!
description.ja: この勇者、下劣ッ…！！勇者・クロエは人々を救う際に報酬を要求する、異質な勇者だった。そして彼が異質なのはその報酬であった…彼は人妻にしか興奮しない為、その町で一番美しい人妻を要求するのであった。「町を救ってほしければ、一番美しい人妻を寄越せ」異色の勇者がおりなすエロファンタジー！

title.en: Youkoso Isekai e, dewa Shinde Kudasai

altTitles.ja: ようこそ異世界へ、では死んでください

altTitles.en: Welcome to Another World, Now then, Please Die

description.en:
"You all will not be heroes. You'll be Living Sacrifices, will you not?"

Atsuto thought that by going to another world his unremarkable life would change and he would be granted all sorts of powers. However, in that other world he found nothing but despair.

Atsuto is an ordinary and unpopular high school student with no remarkable talents or romantic success. One day, his school is enveloped in light, and he is suddenly transported to another world called Tilunog.

Some students who believe they can become heroes with cheat skills are excited about the transfer to the otherworld. However, a beautiful woman from Tilunog named Philia cruelly informs them that they were summoned to be sacrificed, and that they are destined to be killed.

Thus begins a storm of massacre and humiliation by demons, called the "Chaos Banquet" begins! Can Atsuto and his friends survive in this world of despair?

Marin, a caretaker from the Dream Management Bureau, works with Bakuo, a Dream Tapir, to turn young girls' nightmares into sweet dreams. Perhaps they'll come to visit you at your pillow tonight...? A heartwarming dreamy fantasy!

Early one New Year's morning, the rounin Senou Souichirou appears in Edo's Katagi tenements.  
  
Initially, the inhabitants regard him with fear and suspicion: Kankichi, the carpenter's son, thinks he may not be human; the neighborhood cats remark that he reeks of blood. But soon Souichirou pawns his sword, and, with a bamboo replica at his waist, settles down to a quiet life as the neighborhood school-teacher.  
  
Months pass, and all appears to be well. But trouble will not leave the Katagi tenements alone …  
  
---
- **Won the 15th Osamu Tezuka Cultural Grand Prize in 2011**

title.en: Getting Shot on the Frying Pan

altTitles.ja: 鍋に弾丸を受けながら

description.en:
Meet Juntaro. A Japanese fishing addict who was born and raised in what is perceived to be one of the roughest parts of Japan. It is through his lens where you can experience various parts of the world, their culture, and of course their food. He particularly loves to visit countries and cities that are also believed to be highly dangerous due to his personal belief that they will absolutely have delicious food. Because this was intended for a Japanese audience, you will also get to witness various worldviews unique to Japan alongside it all. There's just one problem:

He has extreme brainrot and views the world through a cute anime girl filter.
description.ja: 50000点の美味を求めて美少女（？）が世界の危険地帯に赴き、現地の怪しくも魅惑的な料理の数々を喰らう！ノンフィクション＆カオス＆ハードグルメリポートコミック！

description.en: Kaname Isurugi, who suffered facial injuries in an accident, has a hard time getting along with the people at his school ever since he entered. When school counselor Sugata asks Kaname to help solve the problems of the girls in his charge, Kaname half-heartedly makes contact with four of them. After a month passes without any response, Kaname begins to question his actions. Suddenly, Kaname has a shocking "fateful encounter".This is a coming-of-age mystery love comedy by a splendid tag team!

Popular one-shot from Aokishi's bunny girl insert serialized. 
A romance between the Yakitori shop owner Akira, and the bunny girl, Houka. 
How can he get close to her when he can't leave the grill of his small shop?
description.pt-br: Cinco garotas bonitas em trajes de coelho visitam uma churrascaria todas as noites, encantando o cozinheiro. O dono se sente atraído por uma delas, mas não há muitas abordagens possíveis para ele fazer, pois não pode sair da cozinha. Este mangá retrata a história de amor saudável de um dono de restaurante.

description.en: Dionysus- the young boy who grew up on a small island with no memory of his family and his constant strange nightmares and dreams. One day, Dionysus decided to go on a journey to find his family and discover who he really was, alongside the love of his life, Ariadne.

altTitles.ja: アリスさんちの囲炉裏端

altTitles.th: มื้ออุ่นหน้าเตาแห่งบ้านคุณอลิซ

altTitles.en: By The Hearth At Alice-san's Home
By the Furnace of Miss Alice’s House

description.en:
After ten years, Alice returns to her hometown from Tokyo to live alone in a traditional Japanese house with a sunken hearth. Harumi, her childhood friend, nervously meets her again after such a long time, but the warmth of the hearth with Alice is just as warm as it was in the past...

Next to the hearth in Miss Alice's house, let's have a leisurely meal together.
description.pt-br: Depois de 10 anos, Alice volta de Tóquio para a sua cidade natal e mora sozinha em uma antiga casa tradicional Japonesa com lareira. Harumi, um amigo de infância, estava animado para se encontrar novamente depois de muito tempo, mas o calor da lareira com Alice continua tão quente quanto no passado...

title.en: Saikyou no Maou ni Kitaerareta Yuusha Isekai Kikanshatachi no Gakuen de Musou Suru

altTitles.ja-ro: Saikyou no Maou ni Kitaerareta Yuusha, Isekai Kikansha-tachi no Gakuen de Musou Suru

altTitles.ja: 最凶の魔王に鍛えられた勇者、異世界帰還者たちの学園で無双する

altTitles.en: The Hero Trained by the Worst Demon King Is Unrivaled in the School of Returnees From Another World

altTitles.ja-ro: Sai Kyō no Maō ni Kitae Rareta Yūsha, Isekai Kikan-sha-tachi no Gakuen de Musō Suru

altTitles.en: A Brave Man Trained by the Worst Demon King, Unrivaled in the School of Returnees From Another World

description.en:
Without possessing the unique skill blessed by the goddess, a boy named Kujou Kyouya failed to save the world. He was ridiculed as a “failed hero” at the interdimensional-level academy where returned heroes who had saved many worlds gathered.

However, he became the strongest and most unique hero, having trained for 30,000 years in another world with the most evil demon king, Felice, who has destroyed 3,000 worlds!

Now Kyouya’s unique skill is so powerful that he cannot even be defeated by the strongest heroes! The legend of a boy trained by the most evil demon king, begins!

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Niconico](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/58212),  [BookLive](https://booklive.jp/product/index/title_id/1299578/vol_no/001)
description.id: Tanpa mendapatkan berkah kemampuan unik dari Dewa, anak laki-laki bernama Kujou Kyouya gagal menyelamatkan dunia. Dia diejek sebagai "pahlawan gagal" di akademi level interdimensi di mana pahlawan yang telah menyelamatkan banyak dunia berkumpul. Meski begitu dia dapat menjadi pahlawan terkuat dan terunik, setelah berlatih selama 30.000 tahun di dunia lain dengan Raja Iblis paling jahat, Felice, yang telah menghancurkan 3.000 dunia! Sekarang dengan kemampuan uniknya Kyouya sangat kuat yang bahkan tidak akan bisa dikalahkan oleh pahlawan terkuat sekalipun! Legenda tentang anak laki-laki yang dilatih Raja Iblis paling jahat, dimulai!

altTitles.th: 2.5 มิติ ริริสะ

description.en:
From Seven Seas:
“I have no interest in real girls!” So claims Okumura, the president of the school’s manga club. He’s your typical otaku, obsessed with a sexy (fictional) 2D manga character known as Liliel. Then the new school year starts, and a (real!) 3D girl named Lilysa whose passion is cosplay joins the club. Lilysa convinces Okumura to become her photographer–and guess who her favorite manga character is? Not only that, but Lilysa is into modeling the fetishy stuff, The boundaries between 2D and 3D start to blur as this hot-blooded romantic comedy unfolds.

English volumes by [Seven Seas Entertainment](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/series/2-5-dimensional-seduction/)
description.ja: 現実の女に興味無し！俺の嫁・リリエルは2次元にあり！そんな漫研部長・奥村の前に現れたのは…リアルなリリエル？ドキドキコスプレコメディ開幕！
description.pt:
"Eu não estou interessado em uma mulher real! Minha waifu Liliel está no mundo 2D!" Okumura, presidente do clube de mangá, um dia na sua frente apareceu… uma Liliel real?  
Uma super comédia empolgante começa!
description.pt-br: "Eu não estou interessado em uma mulher real! Minha waifu, Liriel está no mundo 2D!" Okumura, presidente do clube de mangá, um dia na sua frente apareceu... uma Liriel real? Uma super comédia empolgante começa!

title.en: If You Want Me To Hold You, You'll Have To Cry

altTitles.ja: 抱いて欲しけりゃ啼いてみろ

description.en: “Did you cum when I thrust it in your throat?...pervert'' Miyama, who is in his third year of IT sales, was assigned a large project, but he couldn't find a system engineer to work with him in the company! The only person he can count on is Odagiri, a gloomy coworker who entered the company at the same time as him but has hardly ever interacted with. When he was drunk and throwing a fit, Odagiri told him, “Then come right now - right in front of me.'' The cold, dark gaze as if he's licking all over his body gives him a pleasure that can't be compared to fucking a girl…!? Erotic development love between a cool and unaware sadist and a flirtatious, lewd, and a masochist office worker.

Kasane are spirits who latch onto the shadows of people's hearts. But as long as Yayoi and Aoba are around, evil spirits won't be hurting any students at the school! Beautiful art and occult action! The door to the unknown has now been opened...

altTitles.ja: 勇気あるものより散れ

description.en:
The Edo period has ended, and former samurai Haruyasu is adrift in a strange new world. 
Not even the promise of rebellion can cure him of his desire for death. 
Yet after an assassination gone wrong, Haruyasu finds himself at the mercy of his intended victim's bodyguard, 
an intriguing young woman with healing powers --so intriguing that he decides to live in order to learn more about her. 
But what will she ask in return for saving his life?

altTitles.uk: Чи правда, що ви одружуєтесь? [365 днів до весілля]

altTitles.ja: 結婚するって、本当ですか

altTitles.ja-ro: Kekkon suru tte, Hontou desu ka

altTitles.th: แต่งงานที่ว่านี่เรื่องจริงเหรอครับ?

description.en: Takuya and Rika are co-workers for a travel agency and have barely ever interacted as they are both introverted, anti-social people. Both are doing their jobs as normal when an announcement from the higher-ups comes down: in one year, an overseas branch will be opening in Siberia, and an employee from their location will be sent to work there! While there's no telling who will be chosen to go, it is explained that people who are married and have families are far less likely to be sent! Neither Takuya nor Rika want to go to Siberia! Desperate to protect their solitary lives, they develop a plan: pretend that they are getting married to each other! Will they be able to keep up this charade for 365 days, and, maybe, even fall for one another in that time?
description.ru: Такуя и Рика — коллеги по туристическому агентству, они практически не общались друг с другом, так как оба — интроверты. Оба заняты своим делом, как обычно, когда приходит объявление от вышестоящего руководства: через год в Сибири откроется зарубежный филиал, и сотрудник из их отдела будет отправлен туда на работу! Неизвестно, кого выберут, но объяснили, что вероятность того, что туда отправят женатых и имеющих семьи, гораздо ниже, чем одиночек! Ни Такуя, ни Рика не хотят ехать в Сибирь! Отчаявшись защитить свою одинокую жизнь, они придумывают план: сделать вид, что женятся друг на друге! Смогут ли они продержаться 365 дней и, может быть, даже влюбиться друг в друга за это время?
description.uk: Гонджоуджі Ріка та Оогара Такуя працюють у відділі планування туристичної агенції JTC в Токіо, вони не люблять спілкуватися і повноцінно живуть спокійним життям наодинці. Однак через відкриття філії в Сибіру Ріка запропонувала Такуї план, щоб не відправитися за кордон. Чи одружаться ці двоє замкнутих людей всього за 365 днів?
description.pt-br: Takuya e Rika são colegas de trabalho de uma agência de viagens e quase nunca interagiram, pois ambos são introvertidos, pessoas anti-sociais. Ambos estão fazendo seu trabalho normalmente quando um anúncio dos superiores chega: em um ano, uma filial no exterior será aberta na Sibéria, e um funcionário de sua localidade será enviado para trabalhar lá! Embora não se saiba quem será escolhido para ir, explica-se que as pessoas que são casadas e têm família são muito menos propensas a serem enviadas! Nem o Takuya nem a Rika querem ir para a Sibéria! Desesperados para proteger suas vidas solitárias, eles criam um plano: fingir que vão se casar um com o outro! Serão capazes de manter esta farsa por 365 dias, e, talvez, até se apaixonar um pelo o outro nesse tempo?

title.en: Sorcerous Stabber Orphen: The Witch’s Salvation

altTitles.ja: 魔術士オーフェンは ぐれ旅魔女の救済編

description.en:
Orphen and his sister-in-law Azalie are genius sorcerers. They are both studying at [Tower of Fangs], a prestigious training academy for sorcerers.
One day Azalie performed a forbidden ritual, transformed into a terrifying monster, and disappeared from the [Tower of Fangs]. Orphen left [the Tower of Fangs] which had tried to erase Azalie’s existence. Orphen then sets off on a journey to find Azalie.

Jun-won, an ordinary office worker, is bothered by the presence of Lee Jae, his fellow employee, who is different from him in every way.
That day, after a fight over a minor disagreement, he reluctantly joined hands in the name of reconciliation...

What was that feeling just now?

*By Seishun Scans: WARNING! This series contains scenes that may depict sexual harassment, attempted sexual assault, and/or verbal abuse. Reader discretion is advised!*

---

Shinra has a mother who rarely comes home. Everyday, she pinches her pennies just to survive. Rai, a popular guy from her school keeps bothering her, and she’s getting sexually harassed by the manager at her part-time job. After finally coming home after 2 months, Shinra’s mom promises to stay with her. Rai unexpectedly shows up at Shinra’s part-time job and sees her being sexually harassed. He urges her to quit, but she refuses. Shinra comes home only to find out that her mother has disappeared once again
Because his beloved was killed by a silat master, KOLOMENJENG returns to the silat world to find the culprit!
description.id: Karena pujaan hati dibunuh oleh seorang pendekar, KOLOMENJENG kembali ke dunia persilatan untuk mencari pelakunya!

description.en:
On that day, humanity was turned into “prey”―Gen is a high school student living on the island of Tsushima, a door to mainland Japan.

Along with his sickly sister, Misaki, and his heartwarming mother, Gen was living a peaceful life, all until an “asymmetrical monster” appears on the island. All hell breaks loose on the island of Tsushima.

These monsters devour everything from plants to animals, to humans, and mutate together. Will humanity stand a chance against these mutant creatures? Is there any hope?
description.uk:
Того дня людство було перетворено на «здобич».
Ґен — старшокласник, який живе на острові Цушіма, що є дверима до материкової Японії.
Разом зі своєю хворобливою сестрою Місакі та чарівною матір'ю Ґен жив мирним життям, поки на острові не з'явився «асиметричний монстр».

Після цього на острові Цушіма починається пекло.

Ці монстри пожирають все, від рослин до тварин і людей. Після цього мутують.
Чи матиме людство шанс протистояти цим істотам-мутантам?
Є якась надія?

altTitles.fr: Le régresseur de la famille déchue

description.en:
A life filled with regrets.

Once he realized his faults and decided to lead a new life, it was too late. His family was already gone.

He had borne through each day with pure rage. Finally at the end of his misery, his wish reached the heavens—an unforgiven one.

He goes against fate to raise his sword.
description.ko:
후회로만 가득한 생.

스스로의 잘못을 깨닫고 다시 사람이 되고자 했을 때,
이미 가문은 불타 사라진 뒤였다.

발악 같은 분노로 하루하루 연명하던 삶.
그 절망의 끝에서, 간절한 염원이 하늘에 닿았다.

용서받지 못한 자.
운명을 거슬러 검을 들다.

description.en:
"Wouldn't you like to hear my love song?"

Shiori failed to make friends upon entering school, thus, she spends her time as a loner. The only support for her is the music of her favourite singer "Kanade," and she eagerly awaits the release of his new song. Then, by chance, she finds out that  this "Kanade" is actually her classmate, Utsumi! She can't believe she's about to meet her crush in real life, but to her suprise, once they're face to face, Utsumi asks her to be his girlfriend so he can experience love to be able to write a love song. 

A pure, heart-pounding love story that will make your heart skip a beat!.

(Source: Seishun Scans)

Hajun, who works day and night to pay off his parents' debts, takes libido suppressants (Esikon) and lived a quiet life for a long time. One day when he accidentally forgot to take his medicine, his sexual drive, which had been suppressed for a long time due to side effects, surged...! What the android said to Hajun, whose body is hot and dizzy in front of him, "Master, can I help you?"

altTitles.en: To Be You, Even Just for a Day

altTitles.th: ชิงชีวิตพลิกลิขิตชะตา

altTitles.es: Quiero ser tú, solo por un día

altTitles.tr: Sadece Bir Günlüğüne Sen Olmak İstiyorum

altTitles.vi: Tôi muốn trở thành cô ấy, dù chỉ một ngày

altTitles.uk: Я хочу стати тобою хоча б на один день

description.en: Tensions are brewing under the seemingly calm surface of the Vasilios Empire, a kingdom ruled by the Imperial Family and the Temple. Lady Medea Solon has lost her place next to Crown Prince Eros, but resolves to do whatever it will take to win back what's rightfully hers. Will she reclaim her throne?

Mie is a dull high school student who happens to be a professional manga author. He hires an assistant, but the person who came is the number one gal in his class! Despite her looks though, she's extremely good at what she does, and working with her is exciting, stimulating, busy, and fun!!
description.fr: Mie est un lycéen ennuyeux qui se trouve être un mangaka professionnel. Il engage une assistante, mais la personne qui arrive est la plus grande gal de son lycée ! Malgré son physique, elle est extrêmement douée dans ce qu'elle fait, et travailler avec elle est excitant, stimulant, prenant et amusant !

altTitles.ja: レプリカだって、恋をする。

altTitles.en: Even a Replica Falls in Love

altTitles.vi: Kể Cả Bản Sao Cũng Biết Yêu

description.en:
On days when she is sick, on days when she has a tedious day job, on days when she has regular tests.

On days when she is too lazy to go to school, I am called upon.
I am a convenient substitute for the body of a girl named Sonao Aikawa, and that is me.
I may look exactly the same, but my personality is a little different.
I can't go out freely, I can't even make plans for tomorrow,
I am a replica whose mission is to work for the original.
I was supposed to be a replica, but I fell in love.

A very pure and slightly mysterious "love story" that takes place in a town by the sea.
description.ru:
В дни, когда она болеет, в дни, когда у нее нудная дневная работа, в дни, когда у нее очередные контрольные.

В дни, когда ей лень идти в школу, обращаются ко мне.
Я - удобный заменитель тела девушки по имени Сунао Аикава, и это я.
Может, я и выгляжу точно так же, но характер у меня немного другой.
Я не могу свободно выходить на улицу, не могу даже строить планы на завтра,
Я - копия, чья миссия - работать на оригинал.
Я должна была стать копией, но я влюбилась.

Очень красивая и немного загадочная "история любви", которая происходит в городке на берегу моря.
description.vi:
Vào những ngày mà cô ấy bị cảm, vào những ngày mà cô ấy có một công việc tẻ nhạt, vào những ngày mà cô ấy có bài kiểm tra thường xuyên.

Vào những ngày mà cô ấy quá lười để đi học, tôi được gọi ra.
Tôi là vật thay thế cho cơ thể của một cô gái tên là Sonao Aikawa, và đó chính là tôi.
Tôi có lẽ trông giống hệt họ, nhưng mà tính cách của tôi thì có hơi khác một chút.
Tôi không thể tự do ra ngoài được, tôi cũng chẳng thể nào lên kế hoạch cho ngày mai.
Tôi chỉ được coi là một bản sao thôi, nhưng tôi đã biết yêu.

Một "chuyện tình" rất trong sáng và có chút bí ẩn diễn ra tại một thị trấn ven biển.

description.en: Hirose Itsuki is a high school girl who is afraid of getting hurt. One day, Hino, a celebrity at school who quit basketball because of an injury, asks her, "Do you know any good ways to pass the time?" Hino asks her if she knows of any good ways to pass the time, and they end up studying together. Itsuki then gradually becomes aware of Hino. A pure love story of a medical student begins!

title.en: Imasara desu ga, Osananajimi wo Suki ni Natte Shimaimashita

altTitles.ja: 今さらですが、幼なじみを好きになってしまいました

altTitles.vi: Có chút muộn màng nhưng tôi đã phải lòng người bạn thuở nhỏ của mình

altTitles.ja-ro: Imasara desu ga, Osananajimi o Suki ni Natteshimaimashita

altTitles.es-la: Es algo tarde, pero me he enamorado de mi amigo de la infancia

altTitles.en: It's Quite Late, but I've Fallen in Love with My Childhood Friend

altTitles.pl: Nieco Późno, ale Zakochałam się w Moim Przyjacielu z Dzieciństwa

description.en: A manga adaptation of the [novel](https://note.com/saranami/) written by Maruto Fumiaki. The artist for this adaptation is Yom, the mangaka of *Ganbare, Douki-chan*.

title.en: Kaoru Watashi ni Kiss wo shite.

altTitles.ja-ro: Kaoru watashi ni Kiss o shite

altTitles.ja: 香るわたしにキスをして。

altTitles.ja-ro: Kaoru Watashi ni Kiss wo Shite.

description.en:
"You smell so good." "Sorry, but I might not be able to let you go."
 Touka, who secretly has a crush on her senior, is bewildered to find out he felt for her scent. Things develop quickly and she decides to support his dream of becoming a perfumer while they become dangerously close.

title.en: Ninja Slayer: Kyoto, Hell on Earth

altTitles.ru: Ниндзя Слеер: Киото - ад на земле

altTitles.ja: ニンジャスレイヤー キョート・ヘル・オン・アース

altTitles.zh: 忍者杀手 杀伐都市京都

altTitles.en: Ninja Slayer: Kyoto, Hell on Earth

description.en: The man who annihilated the Soukaiya, the enemy of his wife and child, and buried Neo-Saitama in flames has appeared in Gaion City, Kyoto Republic! Ninja Slayer's new battle begins to eradicate his other enemy, the Zaibatsu! The second part of the hugely popular cyberpunk ninja novel, which has sold over 1.5 million copies in total, is now perfectly adapted into a comic!
description.zh:
击破了总会屋的忍者杀手，藤木户·健二，接下来开始朝着另一个仇人罪罚所在的京都进发
助他最终战胜老元·宽的奈落·忍者，在战斗的最后为了保护藤木户的身体而陷入沉眠，接下来的敌人京都罪罚的恐怖威势更是远超预想……
初来乍到的藤木户只在前往京都的路上都要经过连场大战，孤立无援的他究竟要如何才能坚持到最后，为妻儿的复仇画上句号？
在历史名都祇园，忍者杀手Vs忍者的激战在此拉开帷幕！

description.en: The hero in this story is struggling with depression and feels like he has no purpose in life. One day, he is approached by a 500 year old demon lord who takes an interest in him. The demon lord, who is beautiful and powerful, offers to care about a depressed hero from another world the hero and take care of him.
description.fr: Notre héros se bat contre la dépression et ère sans but dans la vie. Un jour, il rencontre la reine des démons alors vieille de 500 ans. Rapidement, elle va s'intéresser à lui. La reine des démons, belle et forte, lui propose alors de s'occuper de lui. Alerte spoiler : l'un d'eux mourra à la fin de cette histoire...
description.pt-br: O protagonista desta história é um herói que enfrenta uma batalha contra a depressão e está em busca de um propósito na vida. Num certo dia, ele é abordado pela Rainha dos Demônios, uma figura elegante e poderosa, com a impressionante idade de 500 anos, que demonstra interesse por ele. Ela oferece cuidar do protagonista, que pertence a outro mundo, e ajudá-lo em sua luta contra a depressão.

description.en:
Ever since his parents died, Watari Nao's life has revolved around his little sister. He forgoes club activities for the sake of spending time with her, leading many of his peers to label him a siscon. But as long as his sister's happy, Nao is willing to shut out any unwelcome comments about himself.  
  
Unbeknownst to Nao, however, a greater danger has resurfaced - one that destroyed his way of life six years ago, and threatens to do so once again.  
  
And that danger, in the form of a girl wielding a garden hoe, will stop at nothing to reclaim what could once have been hers, and hers alone.
description.ru: С тех пор, как его родители умерли, жизнь Ватари Наото вращалась вокруг своей младшей сестры. Он воздерживается от деятельности клуба ради того, чтобы проводить время с ней, в результате чего многие из его сверстников думают, что он влюблён в свою сестру. Но пока его сестра счастлива, Наото готов закрыть глаза на все эти сплетни. Однако ему угрожает та же опасность, что настигла его шесть лет назад. Эта опасность — девушка, которая не уйдет без того, что когда-то принадлежало ей одной!
description.pt-br: Desde que seus pais morreram, a vida de Watari Nao tem girado em torno de sua irmã mais nova. Ele renuncia atividades do clube por causa de passar tempo com ela, levando muitos de seus colegas para rotulá-lo de SISCON. Mas, enquanto sua irmã estiver feliz, Nao está disposto a calar quaisquer comentários indesejáveis sobre si mesmo. Sem o conhecimento de Nao, no entanto, um perigo maior ressurgiu - um que destruiu seu modo de vida, há seis anos, e ameaça fazê-lo mais uma vez, e o perigo vem sob a forma de uma garota empunhando uma enxada de jardim.

description.en:
Miya's classmates hurry her to stop Harutaka from leaving the school, as Itone plans to confess to him. However, amidst the chaos, she mistakes Harutaka's name and shouts out a different name in front of many people.
After becoming the school's laughingstock, Harutaka persuades Miya to start calling each other by their first names, just so the joke dies out.
A few days later, they're set up to go with their class to the mountains for a training camp. This is when Itone finally finds an opportunity to confess to Harutaka, and they start going out.
Miya, finding out about it, is shocked and hurt because she thought she could become someone special to Harutaka.
Yura, Haturaka's friend, finds her being all emotional and tells her that she should start liking him instead. He takes the opportunity and asks her if he could kiss her, to which she complies.

The main character’s father passes away. The will states that each of the three siblings receive a portion of the father’s wealth. The main character receives a Porsche Carrera. She doesn’t know what a Porsche Carrera looks like, didn’t know the car company Porsche, can’t drive a manual and had absolutely no interest in cars, at the time.

Haejoon Goh, who ran from home, and Eunyung Baek, the problem child who lives in a tent.   
These two, who met under terrible circumstances, are forced to live together in an abandoned dormitory.   
This is a story of difficult growth between two people who hate both the dorm and each other.
